rr.simple

Class LastTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • rr.tool.Tool
      • rr.simple.LastTool

  • public final class LastTool
extends Tool
    The last tool in any tool chain. Just absorbs all events.

    • Constructor Summary

      • toChainString

        public java.lang.String toChainString()
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Generates a String representation of the entire tool chain. No need for tools to override.
        Overrides:
        toChainString in class Tool

      • access

        public void access(AccessEvent fae)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Called for each access event (read or write) in the target program. By default, passes the event to the next tool in the chain.
        Overrides:
        access in class Tool

      • fini

        public void fini()
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Tool-specific shutdown. Called when the System is shutting down but before the xml dump happens. Be warned: worker threads could still be running and generating events while fini() runs.
        Overrides:
        fini in class Tool

      • create

        public void create(rr.event.NewThreadEvent e)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        This method of all tools is called for each thread creation event in the target program. Thus, thread creation events are not 'filtered' down the tool chain. By default, this method does nothing. You MUST pass this event along
        Overrides:
        create in class Tool

      • printXML

        public void printXML(XMLWriter xml)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Print out tool-specific log info at the end of the run.
        Overrides:
        printXML in class Tool

      • stop

        public void stop(ShadowThread td)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Called for each thread stop event in the target program. You MUST pass this event along By default, this method does nothing.
        Overrides:
        stop in class Tool

      • acquire

        public void acquire(AcquireEvent ae)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Called for each lock acquire event in the target program. Re-entrant lock acquires are filtered out by RoadRunner, and do not cause acquire events. By default, passes the event to the next tool in the chain.
        Overrides:
        acquire in class Tool

      • release

        public void release(ReleaseEvent re)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Called for each lock release event in the target program. Re-entrant lock release are filtered out by RoadRunner, and do not cause release events. By default, passes the event to the next tool in the chain.
        Overrides:
        release in class Tool

      • classInitialized

        public void classInitialized(ClassInitializedEvent e)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Called right after the static fields of a class have been initialized. By default, passes the event to the next tool in the chain.
        Overrides:
        classInitialized in class Tool

      • classAccessed

        public void classAccessed(rr.event.ClassAccessedEvent e)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Called right before any final static field of a class is read by a thread for the first time. This is necessary to ensure a tool can add a synchronizing edges from the initialization of final fields to the first uses of those fields in other threads.
        Overrides:
        classAccessed in class Tool

      • cloneState

        public ShadowVar cloneState(ShadowVar v)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Makes a copy of a ShadowVar. Called by RoadRunner as part of its handling of calls to "clone()".
        Overrides:
        cloneState in class Tool

      • makeShadowVar

        public ShadowVar makeShadowVar(AccessEvent fae)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Return a fresh variable state for this tool for the location being accessed. Will be called only once per location per tool, when the previous tool calls advance() to indicate that it is no longer interested in owning the location
        Overrides:
        makeShadowVar in class Tool

        public static boolean readFastPath(ShadowVar vs,
